about: I like activities that require logical thinking, creativity, and are not repetitive. I believe my strengths are in systematic and modular work, while my weaknesses are in communication skills, especially negotiation and promotion
pengalaman_kerja_text: During my work, I participated in web/mobile projects and was assigned to work on the front end, CRUD Logic, and integration of payment api using the Low Code platform Outsystems.
sarjana_judul: Bachelor of Computer (S.Kom.) Syarif Hidayatullah State Islamic University Jakarta Majoring in Informatics Engineering
sarjana_text: Graduated with GPA 3.77/4.00 and a Final Project (Thesis) entitled "Virtual Fitting Room Application Using Skeleton Tracking and Euclidean Distance Methods" discusses the development of a Mobile application that can recommend clothing sizes on user photos.
project_subtitle: Here are some projects that I have been/are currently working on. The project I mentioned below is a project that I did myself.

good_4_text: Front End (HTML, CSS, JS), Back End (Java, PHP, Python, Database DDL / DML)
